statements: SELECT * FROM SensorData;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value FROM SensorData WHERE anomaly_flag = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(sensor_value) FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, sensor_value, anomaly_flag FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value, timestamp FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND anomaly_flag = TRUE ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value, timestamp FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_value < 20 OR sensor_value > 80;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_value BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_name, location, reading FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensor_data WHERE reading > 50;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT anomaly_type, anomaly_description FROM anomalies;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, location, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE location = 'Lab A' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, AVG(reading) as avg_reading FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id, sensor_name, location HAVING AVG(reading) > 50;
SELECT sensor_name, location, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT anomaly_type, anomaly_description, detection_date FROM anomalies WHERE sensor_id = 2 ORDER BY detection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, location FROM sensors
SELECT * FROM anomalies
SELECT anomaly_type, severity FROM anomalies
SELECT * FROM anomalies_log
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY location DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Humidity' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE severity IN ('High', 'Medium') ORDER BY detected_at DESC, severity ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM anomalies_log WHERE log_description LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY logged_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, detected_at, severity FROM sensors s JOIN anomalies a ON s.id = a.sensor_id ORDER BY detected_at ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id > 5;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'Temp%';
SELECT * FROM readings ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT anomalies.anomaly_id, anomalies.anomaly_type, alerts.alert_message FROM anomalies JOIN alerts ON anomalies.anomaly_id = alerts.anomaly_id;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM readings WHERE sensor_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) FROM readings GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2021-10-20' ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM anomalies ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 3
SELECT reading_value FROM readings WHERE sensor_id = 5 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, anomaly_type, remediation FROM anomalies_history ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT anomaly_id, sensor_id, detection_method FROM anomalies_detection WHERE sensor_id = 2
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT a.date, a.anomaly_type, s.sensor_name FROM anomalies a JOIN sensors s ON a.sensor_id = s.sensor_id WHERE a.severity >= 7 AND s.location = 'Room A'
SELECT a.anomaly_type, COUNT(*) AS occurrences FROM anomalies a GROUP BY a.anomaly_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY occurrences DESC
SELECT a.id, a.anomaly_type, r.reading_value FROM anomalies a JOIN readings r ON a.sensor_id = r.sensor_id WHERE r.reading_value < 0.5
SELECT * FROM anomalies_detection WHERE detection_method = 'Machine Learning' ORDER BY detection_date ASC LIMIT 5
